meta.name: Time is Money
meta.description: Time is Money is a high-stakes quiz show that offers a unique twist: contestants begin with their prize money already on the line and must race against the clock to keep it. If they fail to answer correctly, their cash prize slips away. The final player remaining will take home everything they've managed to save â€” making every decision a potential game-changer.

videos.title: Episode 1
videos.overview: Quiz, hosted by Sara Davies, in which contestants are given their prize money before they've answered a question, and must race against time to keep hold of it. Each contestant stands before an hourglass-shaped money timer, which begins to drain as the questions are asked - and the only way of stopping it is to answer a question correctly. Once the money is gone, the contestant is out - and only one can make the final to play for the amount they have managed to save.
